Class CarChargingStationsController

This class handles all requestes related to car charging station relations. That means that it handles all web requests to /car-charging-stations.

Methods

| Improve this Doc View Source

GetAllCharChargingStationsAsync()

Queries all car charging stationsand returns a http response that indicates if results were found. If there are any results, it returns a list of ecruise.Models.CarChargingStations.

Declaration
public Task<IActionResult> GetAllCharChargingStationsAsync()
Returns
Type Description
Task<IActionResult>

HTTP 200 Ok: Returns a List of ecruise.Models.CarChargingStations if everything's okay.\n HTTP 204 No Content: There are no ecruise.Models.CarChargingStations.\n HTTP 401 Unauthorized: The authenticated customer has no access list all ecruise.Models.CarChargingStation.
Examples

GET /car-charging-stations
